CustomField.formula: IF ( ( APT_Dangerous_Goods_Flag__c && !APT_Domestic_Overweight_Flag__c && ISPICKVAL(APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c, '') && ISPICKVAL(APT_Dangerous_Goods_Status__c, '') && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPApprov__Approval_Status__c, 'Pending Approval')) && NOT(ISNULL(Apttus_QPConfig__ConfigurationFinalizedDate__c)) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalContextSubmit?sObjectType=Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c&sObjectId="&Id&"&enableAttachments=true", IMAGE("/resource/APT_DGT", "Submit Dangerous Goods for Approval"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Button won't be available if pricing approvals are pending.
CustomField.label: Submit Dangerous Goods for Approval
